com.pathomation

Class CoreAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pathomation.CoreAdmin

  • public class CoreAdmin
extends java.lang.Object
    Intended for PMA.core interactions related to administrative operations. Does NOT apply to PMA.start / PMA.core.lite
    Author:
    Yassine Iddaoui

        public static void setDebugFlag(boolean flag)
        This method is used to determine whether the Java SDK runs in debugging mode or not. When in debugging mode (flag = true), extra output is produced when certain conditions in the code are not met
        Parameters:
        flag - Debugging mode (activated or deactivated)

      • adminUrl

        private static java.lang.String adminUrl(java.lang.Object... varargs)
        This method is used to define which content will be received "XML" or "Json" for "Admin" Web service calls
        Parameters:
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        sessionID : First optional argument(String), default value(null), session's ID

        xml : Second optional argument(Boolean), default value(true), define if method will return XML or Json content

        Returns:
        Adds sequence to the url to specify which content to be received (XML or Json)

      • adminConnect

        public static java.lang.String adminConnect(java.lang.String... varargs)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to authenticate & connect as an admin to a PMA.core instance using admin credentials
        Parameters:
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        pmacoreURL : First optional argument(String), default value(Class field pmaCoreLiteURL), url of PMA.core instance

        pmacoreUsername : Second optional argument(String), default value(""), username for PMA.core instance

        pmacorePassword : Third optional argument(String), default value(""), password for PMA.core instance

        Returns:
        session's ID if session was created successfully, otherwise null
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If target instance isn't a PMA.core instance

      • adminDisconnect

        public static boolean adminDisconnect(java.lang.String... varargs)
        This method is used to disconnect an admin session from a PMA.core instance
        Parameters:
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        sessionID : First optional argument(String), default value(null), session's ID

        Returns:
        True if successfully disconnected, false otherwise

      • sendEmailReminder

        public static java.lang.String sendEmailReminder(java.lang.String admSessionID,
                                                 java.lang.String login,
                                                 java.lang.String... varargs)
        This method is used to send out an email reminder to the address associated with user login
        Parameters:
        admSessionID - admin session ID
        login - user login
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        subject : First optional argument(Boolean), default value(false), Defines whether the user can annotate slides or not

        Returns:
        Empty string if operation successful, an error message otherwise

      • addUser

        public static boolean addUser(java.lang.String admSessionID,
                              java.lang.String login,
                              java.lang.String firstName,
                              java.lang.String lastName,
                              java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String pwd,
                              java.lang.Boolean... varargs)
        This method is used to create a new user on PMA.core
        Parameters:
        admSessionID - admin session ID
        login - user login
        firstName - user's first name
        lastName - user's last name
        email - user's email
        pwd - user's password
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        canAnnotate : First optional argument(Boolean), default value(false), Defines whether the user can annotate slides or not

        isAdmin : Second optional argument(Boolean), default value(false), Defines whether the user is an administrator or not

        isSuspended : Second optional argument(Boolean), default value(false), Defines whether the user is suspended or not

        Returns:
        True if the creation has succeeded, false otherwise

      • reverseRootDirectory

        public static java.lang.String reverseRootDirectory(java.lang.String admSessionID,
                                                    java.lang.String alias)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to lookup the reverse path of a root-directory
        Parameters:
        admSessionID - an admin session ID
        alias - root directory alias
        Returns:
        The reverse path of the root directory it's a file system one, empty string if it's a S3 one
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If something goes wrong

      • createAmazons3MountingPoint

        public static java.lang.String createAmazons3MountingPoint(java.lang.String accessKey,
                                                           java.lang.String secretKey,
                                                           java.lang.String path,
                                                           java.lang.Integer instanceId,
                                                           java.lang.Object... varargs)
        This method is used to create an Amazon S3 mounting point. A list of these is to be used to supply method create_root_directory()
        Parameters:
        accessKey - AWS Access key
        secretKey - AWS secret key
        path - path
        instanceId - instance ID
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        chunkSize : First optional argument(Integer), default value(1048576), chunk size

        serviceUrl : Second optional argument(String), default value(null), service URL

        Returns:
        Amazon S3 mounting point

      • createFileSystemMountingPoint

        public static java.lang.String createFileSystemMountingPoint(java.lang.String username,
                                                             java.lang.String password,
                                                             java.lang.String domainName,
                                                             java.lang.String path,
                                                             java.lang.Integer instanceId)
        This method is used to create an FileSystem mounting point. A list of these is to be used to supply method create_root_directory()
        Parameters:
        username - user name
        password - password
        domainName - domain name
        path - path
        instanceId - instance ID
        Returns:
        Filesystem mounting point

      • createRootDirectory

        public static java.lang.String createRootDirectory(java.lang.String admSessionID,
                                                   java.lang.String alias,
                                                   java.lang.Object... varargs)
        Parameters:
        admSessionID - Admin session ID
        alias - Root directory Alias
        varargs - Array of optional arguments

        amazonS3MountingPoints : First optional argument(List<String>), default value(null), List of amazon S3 mounting points

        fileSystemMountingPoints : Second optional argument(List<String>), default value(null), List of file system mounting points

        description : Third optional argument(String), default value("Root dir created through pma_java"), Root directory description

        isPublic : Fourth optional argument(Boolean), default value(false), defines whether the root directory is public or not

        isOffline : Fifth optional argument(Boolean), default value(null), defines whether the root directory is offline or not

        Returns:
        Response code of the corresponding API call
